CustomField.description: When checked, the Badge will automatically unassign itself from the Contact record when the Assignment record becomes in active. "Is Active" is unchecked. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Badge will automatically unassign itself from the Contact record when the Assignment record becomes in active. "Is Active" is unchecked. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.label: Auto Expire
